title: Girlfriend just broke up with me :/
body:
Only way I can show you guys how I feel :'( 

http://i.imgur.com/nBKkEFz.jpg

R.I.P my feelings

replies.body:
Although I've only been in one meaningful relationship in my life thus far (2 years), yeah, I know the pain you're in. For months, I was sad, but I was always able to get my mind off of it with League. Of course, masking it never completely took away the pain and sadness would return that night; or if not that night, the next night, or the next week. I think I could legitimately say that I was depressed for the better part of half a year. 

The realization that it's time for both of you to move on is both difficult to accept, yet necessary for beginning to feel better. Personally, it took me a little over six months to no longer long for the past. Sure, we had good times, but we all have to move forward; my friends, new and old, helped me reach this point and while I can't say I've never been happier, I can say that I'm doing a hell of a lot better than I was last year.  

If you'd like someone to talk to, I'm always on [**Discord**](http://wrenchmen.org/invite) (unless I'm sleeping or in class) and sometimes on the client. It gets better, and I hope that you feel better soon. 

Wishing you all the best,
Wuks

Wow thank you so much for your kind words Wuks, if I feel I need to talk to someone I'll be sure to hit you up on Discord. I just can't handle giving my time to someone then having them throw that time away like it was nothing. My dad chose booze over me, I lost a lot of friends after I was diagonised with Sciatica because I had to drop out of school, then my ex of 2 and a half years left me, I was only in this relationship for 3 months and a half and what hits me the most is last night we were all smiles and enjoying each others company then this morning she says she wants to break up, without giving me time to talk things out she unfriends me on social media sites and starts to ignore me. I'm a big softy when it comes to love and I really have to stop giving it to people that don't deserve it :( 

Sorry if my comment seems cheezy or lame, but its the truth.
Ahhh. I'm so sorry to hear all this. D: If you need to talk, I'm here as well. Feel free to hit me up on League.

It's tough growing up with each year having less and less friends until you have only a couple online friends that you've never met in real life. Thank you so much for giving me the option to have a talk with you, if I start losing my thoughts again I'll take you up on that offer. 
Thanks again.
Of course! Always happy to lend an ear. ^-^
I sent you a friend request on league, I dont know any other way of talking. But I really need someone to talk to right now.

> [{quoted}](name=StevieSenpai,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5Zw3Wt36,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-30T04:17:22.557+0000)
>
> I sent you a friend request on league, I dont know any other way of talking. But I really need someone to talk to right now.

me? I didnt get it if you did
Watch out Stevie, she might delete you with no forewarning. It's happened a lot.
I hope you get better don't wry everything is gonna be alright D: i gotchu fam :D
Thank you so much for your kind words Rocker500, fam gotta stick together dont they? :)

Holy hell mang. That's fucked up.
I think you may be better off doing like I did and putting any feeling on hold until the general culture all over the world improves and those things happen less.

Let me give you a hug.

http://orig09.deviantart.net/4f6d/f/2011/066/e/a/amumu_wants_hugs_by_ras_blackfire-d3b3tci.jpg
Oh my goodness, thank you so much KateyKhaos, I could use a couple hugs right now!

You know the way Amumu says that is really creepy and condescending right? xD

I know you mean well, but...context, y'know.
tbh you kinda look like a creep
I know, its hard for ugly men to fake being pretty :/

My input may o rmay not be of any use, but at 42 I've been in your shoes quite a few times. I wear my heart on my sleeve, so to speak. I know it hurts, but that's for a reason. Reflect on the relationship and what may have caused it to end. Maybe something you did, maybe something she did...maybe neither of you did anything to end it and it just ran its course. Everything happens for a reason, and if you take the time to reflect on it and learn from it, you'll be a better boyfriend to the next lucky girl to meet you.

Such a great comment, thank you so much.
It makes me feel a little better about myself and really helps me think about the situation.
Sucks m8. Just make sure you keep tour head leveled on the Rift. Wouldn't want you being part of the common salty ban wagon rabble.
Thank you, I'll make sure to keep my head up and proceed to unlock my true pontential as a Urgot Main!
Oh god..
you mean urgod {{champion:6}}

I feel horrible for you man.
I literally booted up my tablet for the first time in months to draw you a picture.
(Granted, I'm not that great at digital art or anything, but I wanted to give it a shot.)
Will edit post once I'm done.

> [{quoted}](name=Combozone,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5Zw3Wt36,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-01-31T20:35:48.144+0000)
>
> I feel horrible for you man.
> I literally booted up my tablet for the first time in months to draw you a picture.
> (Granted, I'm not that great at digital art or anything, but I wanted to give it a shot.)
> Will edit post once I'm done.

Oh my goodness you dont have to do that, wow thank you so much for your nice comment. 
I won't turn you away though if you really want to make something, thank you, really <3

You commented twice, only difference is this one has "Get happy soon bro!" but none-theless thank you so much for your nice comment. I'm doing better each day and with the loving and caring support of all you guys its made the wound easier to heal. I love you all and thank you so much for giving a stranger you don't even know some hope that things will be better.

Ouch dude. I know the feels. I was engaged once and when it ended I'm pretty sure I went crazy for a while. Actually I'm still crazy... but I learned that I'm a pretty awesome dude. But this isn't about me. All I can say is learn to love yourself and the rest will come.

> [{quoted}](name=Dediguise,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5Zw3Wt36,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-30T03:23:54.602+0000)
>
> Ouch dude. I know the feels. I was engaged once and when it ended I'm pretty sure I went crazy for a while. Actually I'm still crazy... but I learned that I'm a pretty awesome dude. But this isn't about me. All I can say is learn to love yourself and the rest will come.

I don't want to be negative but I found this comment kinda funny when you kept saying "crazy" but anyways great advice none the less :)

> [{quoted}](name=ExecutorDill,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5Zw3Wt36,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2016-01-30T04:57:10.022+0000)

> I don't want to be negative but I found this comment kinda funny when you kept saying "crazy" but anyways great advice none the less :)

Laughing isn't negative mate. Glad I brought you some amusement.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I'm so sorry to hear that man, I bet your a crazy awesome dude! :) 
Thank you so much for your kind words.
Were you neglecting her for league? XD jk I hope you feel better *virtual hug*{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Haha not at all, I always picked her over video games. 
Thanks for the virtual hug!
That's why!

I feel horrible for you man.
I literally booted up my tablet for the first time in months to draw you a picture.
(Granted, I'm not that great at digital art or anything, but I wanted to give it a shot.)
Will edit post once I'm done.

Sorry to hear bruh, she was pretty too :o But don't let her get you down. Just know that whatever you experienced with her, their is a big chance that there is someone out their that can make you feel the same way and possibly more... at the same time loving you uncondition and probably just as heart broken as you if your lucky (cause that give you both something to break the ice with :P) you just have to find that person man, stay around people who make you feel good till then and be selective who you all in your love too.... Because as bias as it may sound, a lot of women are really fickle and unsure about what they really want even when sometimes what they want the most is standing right infront them... they also like to play mind games without some of them even acknowledging it >.>


{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
